prod_short_desc: Shoot for the stars with the Y-Wing Microfighter!
prod_long_desc:
Start a mini-scale LEGO® Star Wars adventure with this fun Y-Wing Microfighter, featuring dual flick missiles, front and rear-facing blasters, big engines, white, gray and yellow color scheme, and space to seat the included Y-Wing Pilot with his blaster pistol.
Includes a Y-Wing Pilot minifigure.
Features dual flick missiles, front and rear-facing blasters, big engines, white, gray and yellow color scheme, and an open cockpit with space for a minifigure to sit.
Also includes the Y-Wing Pilot’s blaster pistol.
This set offers an age-appropriate build and play experience for ages 6-12.
Recreate unforgettable scenes from the blockbuster movie Star Wars: Rogue One.
Measures over 1” high, 3” long and 3” wide.
